content.p: Research Funding Literature Review Interns Description: The Crops forthe Future Research Centre (CFFRC) is looking for a social science and business graduates to work with our CropBase programme, as interns to review developments in rural, agriculture and development policy and funding opportunities. This internship will offer a solid learning experience to suitably qualified candidates. To work on an international, multidisciplinary research programme. This is a very valuable opportunity for prospective young researchers and we look forward to working with the interns as they grow their skills at CFFRC. Responsibilities: Requirements: Duration: Maximum two (02) months Salary: RM 2000 per month (for full time) RM 10 per hour (for part time) Interested candidates are invited to write in with full curriculum vitae and contact number to: Prof Sue Walker (CropBase Research Programme Director) Email: Sue.Walker@cffresearch.org or Dr Patrick O'Reilly Email: patrick.oreilly@cffresearch.org Crops for the Future Research Centre (CFFRC) http://www.nottingham.edu.my/CFFRC/index.aspx Level 2 Block B Jalan Broga Semenyih 43500 Semenyih Malaysia telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
